Traveler's Mummery.name: Traveler's Mummery
Traveler's Mummery.flavor: Your free spirit swells outward as you mock your foes and caper about the area. They follow your pantomime like puppets, and your allies follow them.
Traveler's Mummery.effect: Before the attack, you shift 2 squares.
Traveler's Mummery.attack:
Your highest ability + 6 vs. Will
Level 21: Your highest ability + 9 vs. Will
Traveler's Mummery.onHit: 2d6 + your highest ability modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 2 squares, and one ally in the burst can shift 2 squares.

Shape of the Traveler.name: Shape of the Traveler
Shape of the Traveler.flavor: They say the Traveler walks the world unrecognized because it can appear as anyone. You can do much the same.
Shape of the Traveler.effect: You alter your physical form to take on the appearance of any humanoid of Small or Medium size. Your clothing and equipment change size to fit you, but your statistics do not change. The new form lasts until you return to your natural form as a minor action or use this power again. Any creature that attempts to see through your ruse makes an Insight check opposed by your Bluff check, and you gain a +5 bonus to your check.
